articles.title: Lorraine Kelly apologises to Eddie Izzard for 'misgendering' comic during appearance on breakfast show - Daily Record
articles.description: The comedian was appearing on Lorraine and said she never demands the 'she' pronoun, before emotionally thanking the Scots TV host for her support over the years.
articles.content:
Lorraine Kelly apologised to Eddie Izzard for misgendering her during an interview on Thursday's show.
